answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that personal information is collected depending on the interactions with the app and the choices made by the users.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects identifiers, personal information categories listed in the California Customer Records statute, protected classification characteristics, commercial information, biometric information, internet or other similar network activity, geolocation data, and audio, electronic, visual, thermal, olfactory, or similar information.

content: Personal information categories listed in the California Customer Records statute
Internet or other similar network activity
Audio, electronic, visual, thermal, olfactory, or similar information

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the section that outlines the categories of personal information collected by the app in the past twelve months.
reply.reference: Identifiers, personal information categories listed in the California Customer Records statute, protected classification characteristics, commercial information, biometric information, internet or other similar network activity, geolocation data, and audio, electronic, visual, thermal, olfactory, or similar information. URL: https://mentalmedit.com/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that users have the right to request deletion of their personal information, indicating that users can opt out of data collection or delete data.
reply.reference: You can ask for the deletion of your personal information. If you ask us to delete your personal information, we will respect your request and delete your personal information, subject to certain exceptions provided by law. URL: https://mentalmedit.com/privacy-policy/

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app may share information in specific situations as described in the privacy policy document.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app may share personal information in specific situations with certain third parties.
reply.reference: We may share information in specific situations and with specific third parties. Learn more about when and with whom we share your personal information. URL: https://mentalmedit.com/privacy-policy/
